Name: Time
Description: Number of moves that the card exists for

Name: Material
Description: Everything material

Name: Mind
Description: On everything that has a mind. Basis for social interaction. If there is no mind, there can be no communication.

Name: Magic
Description: Everything related to magical effects

Name: Image
Description: On everything strange that can be perceived: a painting, traces, unknown runes, blood stains, scratches, etc.

Name: Person
Description: Important characteristics of the character, what they are like

Name: Thing
Description: On everything that can be touched, examined, and physically interacted with

Name: Body
Description: On all NPCs that have a body. And on everything that has a body. For example, a dead NPC also has a body.

Name: Place
Description: Designation of spaces: cemetery, room, street, etc.

Name: Phenomenon
Description: Everything immaterial, sounds, natural phenomena, etc.

Name: Secret
Description: On everything mysterious and enigmatic. For decryption, solving, and so on

Name: Memory
Description: On all memories

Name: Dissent
Description: On all creatures that have a different form of consciousnessmind and therefore cannot speak to the heroes without additional magical influence

Name: Building
Description: Structures, everything that can be entered

Name: Obstacle
Description: Can be on objects/structures as well as NPCs. Anything that blocks the way.

Name: Heavy
Description: For large objects that cannot be lifted, taken away, etc.

Name: Ingredient
Description: Something that can be used in crafting

Name: Complex
Description: All complex objects that require special talents to interact with them. For example, devices and mechanisms.

Name: Useful
Description: On everything that can be taken and further used. Including ingredients that go into the inventory and then used in workshops.

Name: Damaged
Description: Everything that is damaged. Can be on items as well as NPCs

Name: Mechanism
Description: On all mechanisms

Name: Container
Description: Everything that can be opened

Name: Small
Description: Everything that can be taken

Name: Sadness
Description: Grief, sadness, shame, etc. on NPCs

Name: Locked
Description: Everything closed

Name: Fear
Description: Embarrassment, helplessness, awkwardness, etc. on NPCs

Name: Irritation
Description: Characters who are irritated at the moment.

Name: Weakness
Description: After applying physics to body parts

Name: Creature
Description: Living creature
